cerVideoSessionMib.name: cerVideoSessionMib

revisions.description: Remove cerErmSessionServerPort. use cerErmSessionRPCServerPort instead of cerErmSessionServerPort in NOTIFICATION-TYPE cerVideoSessionErmConnection
Change the range of ERM session index
Updated MIB to E6000 IEQ Application PSA v3.2
Updated MIB to E6000 IEQ Application PSA v2.1

cerVideoSessionMib.contactinfo: Network Management Postal: Arris International. 4300 Cork Airport Business Park Cork Airport, Kinsale Road Cork, Ireland. Tel: +353 21 7305 800 Fax: +353 21 4321 972
cerVideoSessionMib.description: This MIB contains objects to display video sessions and control Switched Digital Video on the ARRIS E6000 CER.

CerSessionType.name: CerSessionType
CerSessionType.description: A convenient type definition for the type of traffic supported by a session-based ERM. vod - vod-only sdv - sdv-only linear - linear-only any - any type

CerErmType.name: CerErmType
CerErmType.description: A convenient type definition for the type of ERM. cvex - ARRIS CVEX ERM usrm - Cisco ERM

CerTransportState.name: CerTransportState
CerTransportState.description: A convenient type definition for input TS states. These can be as follows joining - Primary stream--waiting for video to arrive forwarding - Primary stream-video is arriving and being forwarded on a QAM coldspare - Backup multicast session that has not been joined yet hotspare - Backup multicast seesion that has been joined, but is not being forwarded failed - Primary stream that either timed out or failed.

cervMulticastProtocol.name: cervMulticastProtocol
cervMulticastProtocol.description: The type of multicast signaling for SDV and broadcast.

cervMulticastTimeoutInterval.name: cervMulticastTimeoutInterval
cervMulticastTimeoutInterval.description: The multicast (SDV and linear) TS timeout interval in seconds.

cervMulticastInterface.name: cervMulticastInterface
cervMulticastInterface.description: The global interface for IEQ multicast.

cerErmSessionRPCServerPort.name: cerErmSessionRPCServerPort
cerErmSessionRPCServerPort.description: Contains the local TCP server port value used for ERM sessions.

cerVideoSessionTable.name: cerVideoSessionTable
cerVideoSessionTable.description: This table lists video sessions. When doing multicast for SDV, there is one row For each replication of the multicast.

cerVideoSessionEntry.name: cerVideoSessionEntry
cerVideoSessionEntry.description: An entry for the video session table.

cerveSessionVe.name: cerveSessionVe
cerveSessionVe.description: The Virtual Edge for this session.

cerveSessionId.name: cerveSessionId
cerveSessionId.description: Video session identifier. Session ids may not be unique across VEs.

cerveSessionState.name: cerveSessionState
cerveSessionState.description: Video session state. inactive-the session has not yet been joined, or was Active and failed psi--the session is starting and awaiting PSI tables (used for RPC sessions) data--the session is starting, has seen PSI tables and is awaiting audio/video data (used for RPC sessions) active-the session is forwarding video traffic to this channel

cerveSessionChanCont.name: cerveSessionChanCont
cerveSessionChanCont.description: The channel container index. Used for both multicast and unicast sessions for consistency.

cerveSessionQamIfIndex.name: cerveSessionQamIfIndex
cerveSessionQamIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the output QAM used by this video session.

cerveSessionTsid.name: cerveSessionTsid
cerveSessionTsid.description: The TSID of the output QAM channel used by this video session.

cerveSessionBandwidth.name: cerveSessionBandwidth
cerveSessionBandwidth.description: Configured video session bandwidth in bits per second.

cerveSessionBitrate.name: cerveSessionBitrate
cerveSessionBitrate.description: Current measured video session bitrate in bits per second.

cerveSessionTimeActive.name: cerveSessionTimeActive
cerveSessionTimeActive.description: The length of time that the input stream has been forwarded since last becoming active is stored in cerveSessionTimeActive. If the cerveSessionState is not set to active, then this value is zero.

cerveSessionNoPidRemapping.name: cerveSessionNoPidRemapping
cerveSessionNoPidRemapping.description: If true, PIDs are not remapped for this video session.

cerveSessionGroupId.name: cerveSessionGroupId
cerveSessionGroupId.description: Identifies the group to which this video session belongs. A value of zero indicates that this session is not part of a group.

cerveSessionOutProgNumber.name: cerveSessionOutProgNumber
cerveSessionOutProgNumber.description: The output program number of the active transport used by this video session.

cerveSessionIsMulticast.name: cerveSessionIsMulticast
cerveSessionIsMulticast.description: If true, this is a multicast session.

cerveSessionAssetId.name: cerveSessionAssetId
cerveSessionAssetId.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR).

cerveSessionOnDemandId.name: cerveSessionOnDemandId
cerveSessionOnDemandId.description: OnDemand Video session identifier included in an NGOD create session message. Unused if session was not created using NGOD.

cerveSessionTransportId.name: cerveSessionTransportId
cerveSessionTransportId.description: The transport ID currently in use for this session.

cerVideoIpSessionTable.name: cerVideoIpSessionTable
cerVideoIpSessionTable.description: This table maps a DIP address and UPD dport to a video session ID. It is used for both SDV and session-based VOD. There is only one row in the table for each session, even when there is Service Level Redundancy--the one for the current primary source of the input TS.

cerVideoIpSessionEntry.name: cerVideoIpSessionEntry
cerVideoIpSessionEntry.description: An entry for the video IP session table.

cervIpSessionDestIpAddr.name: cervIpSessionDestIpAddr
cervIpSessionDestIpAddr.description: The destination IP address of this video session.

cervIpSessionDestUdpPort.name: cervIpSessionDestUdpPort
cervIpSessionDestUdpPort.description: The destination UDP port of this video session.

cervIpSessionSrcIpAddr.name: cervIpSessionSrcIpAddr
cervIpSessionSrcIpAddr.description: The source IP address of this video session. Zero means not specified.

cervIpSessionVe.name: cervIpSessionVe
cervIpSessionVe.description: The Virtual Edge for this session.

cervIpSessionAddrType.name: cervIpSessionAddrType
cervIpSessionAddrType.description: Type of source and desttination IP address.

cervIpSessionAssetId.name: cervIpSessionAssetId
cervIpSessionAssetId.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR).

cerVideoSessionAssetTable.name: cerVideoSessionAssetTable
cerVideoSessionAssetTable.description: This table maps a DIP address and UPD dport to a video session ID. It is used for both SDV and session-based VOD. There is only one row in the table for each session, even when there is Service Level Redundancy--the one for the current primary source of the input TS.

cerVideoSessionAssetEntry.name: cerVideoSessionAssetEntry
cerVideoSessionAssetEntry.description: An entry for the video IP session table.

cervSessionAssetAssetId.name: cervSessionAssetAssetId
cervSessionAssetAssetId.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR).

cervSessionAssetTransportId.name: cervSessionAssetTransportId
cervSessionAssetTransportId.description: The Transport Id for this Video Session.

cervSessionAssetChanCont.name: cervSessionAssetChanCont
cervSessionAssetChanCont.description: Contains the channel container index for all sessions.

cerVideoSessionTransportTable.name: cerVideoSessionTransportTable
cerVideoSessionTransportTable.description: This table lists the transports (active and backup) used by video sessions on the CER.

cerVideoSessionTransportEntry.name: cerVideoSessionTransportEntry
cerVideoSessionTransportEntry.description: An entry for the video session transport table.

cervSessionTransportAddrType.name: cervSessionTransportAddrType
cervSessionTransportAddrType.description: Type of source and desttination IP address.

cervSessionTransportSrcIpAddress.name: cervSessionTransportSrcIpAddress
cervSessionTransportSrcIpAddress.description: Video session transport source IP address.

cervSessionTransportDestIpAddress.name: cervSessionTransportDestIpAddress
cervSessionTransportDestIpAddress.description: Video session transport destination IP address. For multicast streams, this is the multicast IP address of the stream. For unicast streams, this is the IP address of the gigabit Ethernet port where the stream is received.

cervSessionTransportDestUdpPort.name: cervSessionTransportDestUdpPort
cervSessionTransportDestUdpPort.description: Video session transport destination UDP port.

cervSessionTransportAssetId.name: cervSessionTransportAssetId
cervSessionTransportAssetId.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR).

cervSessionTransportBandwidth.name: cervSessionTransportBandwidth
cervSessionTransportBandwidth.description: The bandwidth of the SDV or VOD session. Zero means not specified.

cervSessionTransportInProgNumber.name: cervSessionTransportInProgNumber
cervSessionTransportInProgNumber.description: The incoming program number of the TS. Zero means the first program in the TS.

cervSessionTransportState.name: cervSessionTransportState
cervSessionTransportState.description: The state of this incoming session.

cerVideoIpTransportTable.name: cerVideoIpTransportTable
cerVideoIpTransportTable.description: This table maps multicast IP address and UPD port to transport ID.

cerVideoIpTransportEntry.name: cerVideoIpTransportEntry
cerVideoIpTransportEntry.description: An entry for the video session multicast transport table.

cervIpTransportDestIpAddr.name: cervIpTransportDestIpAddr
cervIpTransportDestIpAddr.description: Video session transport destination IP address.

cervIpTransportSrcIpAddr.name: cervIpTransportSrcIpAddr
cervIpTransportSrcIpAddr.description: Video session transport source IP address. Zero if not set.

cervIpTransportUdpPort.name: cervIpTransportUdpPort
cervIpTransportUdpPort.description: Video session transport destination UDP port.

cervIpTransportAssetId.name: cervIpTransportAssetId
cervIpTransportAssetId.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR).

cervIpTransportAddrType.name: cervIpTransportAddrType
cervIpTransportAddrType.description: Type of source and desttination IP address.

cerveErmSessionTable.name: cerveErmSessionTable
cerveErmSessionTable.description: This table stores parameters for each Virtual Edge video ERM object, if defined.

cerveErmSessionEntry.name: cerveErmSessionEntry
cerveErmSessionEntry.description: Virtual Edge ERM configuration parameter table

cerveErmSessionVeIndex.name: cerveErmSessionVeIndex
cerveErmSessionVeIndex.description: This is the VE controlled by this ERM.

cerveErmSessionErmIndex.name: cerveErmSessionErmIndex
cerveErmSessionErmIndex.description: This is the ERM used for this Virtual Edge. Multiple VEs may use same ERM.

cerveErmSessionAdminState.name: cerveErmSessionAdminState
cerveErmSessionAdminState.description: Whether or not the VE session-base ERM interface is enabled. Not used if cerveErmSessionIndex is zero.

cerveErmSessionControlIpAddr.name: cerveErmSessionControlIpAddr
cerveErmSessionControlIpAddr.description: This is the source loopback address used when communicating with the ERM and for receiving messages from the ERM.

cerveErmSessionControlIfIndex.name: cerveErmSessionControlIfIndex
cerveErmSessionControlIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the loopback interface for communicating with an ERM.

cerveErmSessionRowStatus.name: cerveErmSessionRowStatus
cerveErmSessionRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for controlling entries in this table. Allowed values are createAndGo, destroy, and active.

cerveErmSessionStatusTable.name: cerveErmSessionStatusTable
cerveErmSessionStatusTable.description: This table lists video session statistics for a session-based ERM.

cerveErmSessionStatusEntry.name: cerveErmSessionStatusEntry
cerveErmSessionStatusEntry.description: An entry for the video session qam table.

cerveErmSessionStatusConnected.name: cerveErmSessionStatusConnected
cerveErmSessionStatusConnected.description: True if this VE is connected to the session ERM, false otherwise.

cerveErmSessionStatusAddrType.name: cerveErmSessionStatusAddrType
cerveErmSessionStatusAddrType.description: Type of IP Address for session-based ERM. Comes from cerveErmSessionAddrType.

cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessions.name: cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessions
cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessions.description: The total number of sessions created for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessionFails.name: cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessionFails
cerveErmSessionStatusCreateSessionFails.description: The total number of failures to creaate a session for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessions.name: cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessions
cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessions.description: The total number of sessions deleted for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessionFails.name: cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessionFails
cerveErmSessionStatusDeleteSessionFails.description: The total number of delete sessions failures for the VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounces.name: cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounces
cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounces.description: The total number of announce messages for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounceFails.name: cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounceFails
cerveErmSessionStatusAnnounceFails.description: The total number of failed announce messages for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessions.name: cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessions
cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessions.description: The total number of query session requests for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionFails.name: cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionFails
cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionFails.description: The total number of failed session queries for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfo.name: cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfo
cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfo.description: The total number of query session Info requests for this VE.

cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfoFai.name: cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfoFails
cerveErmSessionStatusQuerySessionInfoFai.description: The total number of failed session Info queries for this VE.

cerErmSessionTable.name: cerErmSessionTable
cerErmSessionTable.description: This table stores parameters for each Virtual Edge video ERM object, if defined.

cerErmSessionEntry.name: cerErmSessionEntry
cerErmSessionEntry.description: Virtual Edge ERM configuration parameter table

cerErmSessionErmIndex.name: cerErmSessionErmIndex
cerErmSessionErmIndex.description: This is the ERM used for this Virtual Edge. Multiple VEs may use same ERM.

cerErmSessionSessionType.name: cerErmSessionSessionType
cerErmSessionSessionType.description: The type of sessions controlled by this ERM.

cerErmSessionDescription.name: cerErmSessionDescription
cerErmSessionDescription.description: Contains a text description of the ERM configuration.

cerErmSessionVendorId.name: cerErmSessionVendorId
cerErmSessionVendorId.description: The ERM configuration file vendor ID.

cerErmSessionConnTimeout.name: cerErmSessionConnTimeout
cerErmSessionConnTimeout.description: Contains the control plane timeout for a session ERM.

cerErmSessionRowStatus.name: cerErmSessionRowStatus
cerErmSessionRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for controlling entries in this table. Allowed values are createAndGo, destroy, and active.

cerErmSessionAnncMsgEnable.name: cerErmSessionAnncMsgEnable
cerErmSessionAnncMsgEnable.description: Whether or not to do Announce RPC messages to this ERM.

cerVideoChanContTable.name: cerVideoChanContTable
cerVideoChanContTable.description: This table contains the list of QAM channel-container memberships. All members of a given CC are transmitting the same multicast stream. A single QAM can be a member of multiple channel containers, meaning that it is transmitting multiple session-based streams.

cervChanContIndex.name: cervChanContIndex
cervChanContIndex.description: For multicast sessions, the channel container index.

cervChanContQamIfIndex.name: cervChanContQamIfIndex
cervChanContQamIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the QAM channel.

cervChanContOutProgNumber.name: cervChanContOutProgNumber
cervChanContOutProgNumber.description: The output program number associated with this session.

cervChanContVe.name: cervChanContVe
cervChanContVe.description: The ID tying together all of the transports defined for this video session. Only important when doing Service Level Redundancy (SLR). Zero is reserved for future use when the channel container might be manually configured.

cervChanContSessionId.name: cervChanContSessionId
cervChanContSessionId.description: Video session identifier. Session ids may not be unique across VEs. The null string is reserved for manually configured CC in the future.

cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexTable.name: cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexTable
cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexTable.description: This table maps the session ERM output port number in, for example, a create session message to the IfIndex of a QAM channel.

cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexEntry.name: cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexEntry
cervLookupOutPortToIfIndexEntry.description: The ERM output port number (channel) to ifIndex mapping table

cervLookupOutPortVeIndex.name: cervLookupOutPortVeIndex
cervLookupOutPortVeIndex.description: Index of Session-based VE using this virtual port number.

cervLookupOutPortOutPort.name: cervLookupOutPortOutPort
cervLookupOutPortOutPort.description: Session ERM output port number for this channel.

cervLookupOutPortIfIndex.name: cervLookupOutPortIfIndex
cervLookupOutPortIfIndex.description: The ifIndex for the QAM channel corresponding to this ERM output Port number. Zero means that this output port number is not yet assigned.

cervLookupConnToVirtPortTable.name: cervLookupConnToVirtPortTable
cervLookupConnToVirtPortTable.description: This table maps the physical RF port number to the virtual RF port number used in the exported session ERM configuration file.

cervLookupConnToVirtPortEntry.name: cervLookupConnToVirtPortEntry
cervLookupConnToVirtPortEntry.description: Physical RF port to ERM virtual RF port number mapping table

cervLookupConnVeIndex.name: cervLookupConnVeIndex
cervLookupConnVeIndex.description: Index of Session-based VE using this virtual port number.

cervLookupConnVirtRfPort.name: cervLookupConnVirtRfPort
cervLookupConnVirtRfPort.description: Session ERM virtual RF port number.

cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortTable.name: cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortTable
cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortTable.description: This table maps the ifIndex of a QAM channel to the session ERM output port number in, for example, a create session message.

cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortEntry.name: cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortEntry
cervLookupIfIndexToOutPortEntry.description: Channel ifIndex to ERM output port number to mapping table

cervLookupIfIndexChan.name: cervLookupIfIndexChan
cervLookupIfIndexChan.description: The ifIndex for the QAM channel corresponding to this ERM output Port number.

cervLookupIfIndexVeIndex.name: cervLookupIfIndexVeIndex
cervLookupIfIndexVeIndex.description: Index of Session-based VE using this virtual port number.

cervLookupIfIndexOutPort.name: cervLookupIfIndexOutPort
cervLookupIfIndexOutPort.description: Session ERM output port number for this channel.

cervLookupIfIndexVirtChan.name: cervLookupIfIndexVirtChan
cervLookupIfIndexVirtChan.description: Session ERM virtual channel number. CVEX allows 64 channels per virtual RF port. USRM allows 36.

cervLookupIfIndexVirtRfPort.name: cervLookupIfIndexVirtRfPort
cervLookupIfIndexVirtRfPort.description: Session ERM virtual RF port number. CVEX allows a total of 60 virtual RF ports. USRM allows 24 total.

cervLookupIfIndexChanPerConn.name: cervLookupIfIndexChanPerConn
cervLookupIfIndexChanPerConn.description: There are 16 channels per Virtual port for a vod-only ERM and 32 otherwise.

cervLookupIfIndexRowStatus.name: cervLookupIfIndexRowStatus
cervLookupIfIndexRowStatus.description: The RowStatus for controlling entries in this table. Allowed values are createAndGo, destroy, and active.

cerVideoSessErrorStr.name: cerVideoSessErrorStr
cerVideoSessErrorStr.description: Description of error encountered on the ERM interface.

cerVideoSessionErmConnection.name: cerVideoSessionErmConnection
cerVideoSessionErmConnection.description: This trap is sent when the session ERM connection fails.

cerVideoSessionNoStart.name: cerVideoSessionNoStart
cerVideoSessionNoStart.description: This trap is sent a Session-based input stream never starts.

cerVideoSessionStreamFail.name: cerVideoSessionStreamFail
cerVideoSessionStreamFail.description: This trap is sent a session-based input stream was being received has failed.

cerVideoSessionMsgError.name: cerVideoSessionMsgError
cerVideoSessionMsgError.description: This trap is sent when the E6000 rejects a request from an SRM.

cerVideoSessionMcLinkFail.name: cerVideoSessionMcLinkFail
cerVideoSessionMcLinkFail.description: This trap is sent when the NSI link that was being used for multicast Joins/Leaves fails.
